column5: Montreal area crappies have been on fire,most of the fish have been 10 to 12 inches,sorry about the background,but crappie spots are like gold around here.
Geez, I thought you were talking about the Habs!  lol  Darn nice slabs you're holdin there, Larry!
Nice plywood there! Those are beauties

VERY NICE looking black crappies....for me so far it's been "crappie"...fishing for them...LOL...but maybe tomorrow will be different...  My weather has NOT been nice every time I can go crappie fishing...but that has to change...  Bob
me too!  those are some nice slab's there
I was wondering who would be first!  You win Mike
My daughters is bigger!  We caught these on Monday.    Cheers, Ron...
Looks like some nice crappies can be caught down that way as well. Didn't think there was many crappies in Montreal area.
Nice slabs gang,  The "Montreal Crappies" are the Habs farm team I believe.
wow nice. I have zero clue where to get crappies in Montreal lol
here I thought this was another hockey thread...Nice all kidding aside..
ouch that hurts. Too soon. I am still in mourning and mending my broken heart
